content.question: Which of the following correctly describes the change in average speed of the molecules, if any, as the gas is taken through each process?

choices.label: Process 1 Process 2 It increases. It increases.
Process 1 Process 2 It increases. It remains the same.
Process 1 Process 2 It decreases. It increases.
Process 1 Process 2 It decreases. It remains the same.

content.answer: Process 1 Process 2 It decreases. It increases.

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
